amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize $12 million in fiscal years 1996 and 1997 for debt relief for Latin America and the Caribbean.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 77 in the Congressional Record of May 23 , to increase funding authorized in the bill from $3 million to $12 million to provide Latin American and Caribbean countries funds for debt reduction or for the purchase of U.S. goods.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 297 (Roll no. 352).
